page.title: 13A Day In My Life
page.content: I am a pupil at Achahoish Primary School which is the only school in the block. Iget up at 8:30 and have my breakfast, usually cereal, toast and a drink of milk. The school bus picks me up at about 9:10am. School starts at half past nine. We do our language work from 9:30 till 10:50 when we have a playtime. Then we do Maths. till lunchtime. We all have our dinner at school, I like it! We play till 1 o'clock, then we do lots of different things depending on what day it is. We do projects like Domesday, art, music or P.E. I like the computer best. The school bus takes us home at 3:30pm. I watch T.V., do my homework and have my tea. My favourite tea is fish fingers and chips. I usually go to bed at 8 o'clock.
